Windlord picked the sigan and opened a com link to KEnzo "Kenzo a 
Pod it's comming... if you're in conditions to come join us... it's 
maximal...."

Windlord and Blackfang ran toward Pod's landing coordinates


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> There was the void outside, on the other side of the little escape 
> pod's hull. Then, there was the void inside, in his spark. At the 
> focus of both voids, there was the flaming wreck of the ship, 
> bringing flashes in space and twinges in Templar's mind.
> 
> Templar: Why am I still living, while you, dear friend, are dead? 
> Their is no more purpose left to me now, no reasons...
> 
> The escape pod drifted aimlessly until a small piece of debris 
> violently hit it. The propulsors let go of a silvery-white steam 
and 
> started spinning very fast. Templar tried to force the controls to 
> obey him, but he started welcoming this instant as the one 
> preceeding his death.
> 
> Templar: There it is, dear friend... I will join you nonetheless...
> 
> He tried to stay conscious long enough to greet Death with arms 
wide 
> open, but passed away before. However, the pod managed to place 
> itself in Earth's orbit and to send out a wide range SOS signal. 
The 
> maximal origin of the message did betray its user, though.
